New_York.Actors Studio Drama School at Pace Unive: The Actors Studio Drama School at Pace University is a three-year graduate program in the theater arts. It has been located at Pace University since 2006 and grants Master of Fine Arts degrees in acting, directing, and playwriting. James Lipton serves as Dean Emeritus. The program is sanctioned by the Actors Studio, though graduation from the school does not guarantee membership in the Actors Studio.
